response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in innovation and efficiency. We believe its value extends far beyond its initial cost, making it a strategic asset for any forward-thinking organization. Given its unique features and market positioning, we are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This is a special opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your business objectives.", "product_price": 1200000}
